|brand = Xiaomi |model = BE7000 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (RC06) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/20/2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Xiaomi_BE7000 |wlclass = BE7000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ9554; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A73 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8084; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 7, WPA3, MLO, NFC |addchip = 2.4GHz FEM;Qorvo;QPF4211;;4;,,, 5GHz FEM;Qorvo;QPF4559;;4;,,, PMIC;MPS;MP5496;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax+be
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2023 |estprice = 115 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 408×133×177mm |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN6224; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax/be |rad2be = 5764 |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5.2
|wi3_if_name = |rad3mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad3modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad3chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad3chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad3chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad3chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = <!-- Number of transmit radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad3rxchains = <!-- Number of receive radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad3sstreams = <!-- Number of spatial data streams, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad3stand = <!-- IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ad/ax/be, Capable standards for thos radio --> |rad3be = <!-- Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3ay = <!-- Maximum throughput rated at --> |axqam3 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad3ax = <!-- 574, 1148, 4804, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3ad = <!-- ???, Maximum throughput rated at --> |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = <!-- 433, 867, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3freq = 5.8
}}

==See also== :;[[List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices]] *[[Xiaomi BE3600]] (RD15) • BE3600 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :''Xiaomi Router BE3600'' (RC07) • ''Qualcomm Immersive Home'' • [https://www.acwifi.net/26827.html AC|WiFi] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ5312 (4x @1.1GHz), QCN6402, YT8821C, 256/512MB *[[Xiaomi BE6500 Pro]] • BE6500 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :''Xiaomi Router BE6500 Pro'' (RD08) • ''Qualcomm Immersive Home 3210'' • [https://post.m.smzdm.com/p/arqxovmx/ Spec.] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ5332 (4x @1.5GHz), QCN6274 (QCN6432), 128/1024MB, NFC *[[Xiaomi BE7000]] • BE7000 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :''Xiaomi Router 7000'' (RC06) • ''Qualcomm Networking Pro'' • [https://www.acwifi.net/24559.html AC|WiFi] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ9554 (4x @1.5GHz), QCN5024/QCN6224, 128/1024MB *[[Xiaomi BE10000]] • BE10000 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :[[Xiaomi Router 10G]] (RC01) • ''Qualcomm Networking Pro'' • [https://www.acwifi.net/23365.html AC|WiFi] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ9570 (4x @2.2GHz), QCN6214/2x QCN6274, 256/2048MB
